titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1938 Peggram
Mr. Reed Hotel des Deux Continents Hotel de Seine 25 Jacob. 52 rue de Seine VIe.
6 m 1 vol a 70 student deposit 50v
Sept. 26 Harte Crane Oct 10 Oct. 10 Mr. Norris Changes Trains Oct 11 Oct 11 Sally Bowles Oct 12 Oct 12 Starting Point 1v extra Oct 17 Oct 12 Stories of Three Decades Oct 25 Oct 25 New Writing Nov 7 Nov 7 Time + The River ren. Nov 21 Dec 5 Dec 5 Day & Melancholy Flux Dec 19 Dec 19 Dance of the Quick + the Dead Jan 4 Jan 4 Phoenix Jan 9 Jan 9 Guermantes Way - vol I (ren Jan 23) Feb 6 Feb 6 Guermantes Wy - vol II ren Jan 6 Feb 20 Mar 6 Fountain ren Mar 20 March 27 March 27 ren August closed so extended Apr 3 to November 26 Renewed March 26 - Sep October 26 1939 Apr 6 mos 1 v S 70v Mar 3 Moon + Sixpence Apr 17 3 On the Frontier 2v pd. Apr 4 4 Journey to a War 2v pd 8v April 11 17 Handful of Dust Apr 30 May 1 Sparkenbroke May 18 15 Still Centre 2v pd. May 19 15 Corn King + Spring Queen ren 5/30/ June 12th
June 12. Strindberg plays. June 26 26 Strindberg plays 2nd series July 24 ren july 10th July 24 Strindberg's Plays 3rd Series july 24
